action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Informatics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: French
AVAILABILITY: Tomorrow

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

action.content: ASIDE: The interviewer does not know about my bachelor's degree yet.

probes.question: ME: Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
